message:
Fact #16 ~ If you were to ask 100 rescued victims of child sex-trafficking where they see themselves in 10 years, just about all of 
them would say they won't be alive then. 
Sadly, an average lifespan, after enslavement, is 7 years.
#HelpERASE #ChildTrafficking

data.title: 30 Facts about Human Trafficking
